post:
<center>
Hey friends! [SmallWeb ](https://smallweb.net "SmallWeb") has gone through some changes recently. 
After seperating our yearly and monthly services as "Budget" and "Shared" we refreshed our Budget plans and pricing earlier this month after a long review.

![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhRSNsHXcAA_W1P?format=png&name=large "")


**Here are the budget plans!**

**Budget ¼GB**
¼GB (256MB) NVMe Storage, 100GB Transfer, 1 Website(s)
Email Functionality Disabled
**Only £1.99/year**
[Order Now](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/budget/?group_id=45&pricing_id=1407 "Order Now")

**Budget ½GB**
½GB (512MB) NVMe Storage, 100GB Transfer, 2 Website(s)
**Only £2.99/year**
[Order Now](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/budget/?group_id=45&pricing_id=1408 "Order Now")

**Budget 1GB**
1GB NVMe Storage, 100GB Transfer, 5 Website(s)
**Only £5.99/year**
[Order Now](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/budget/?group_id=45&pricing_id=1409 "Order Now")

**Budget 2GB**
2GB NVMe Storage, 200GB Transfer, 10 Website(s)
**Only £9.99/year**
[Order Now](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/budget/?group_id=45&pricing_id=1410 "Order Now")

SmallWeb Ltd is registered in England & Wales under company 12272693
</center>
